data.name: The Expendables 2 Videogame
data.detailed_description:
Four Expendables (Barney, Gunner, Caesar and Yin Yang) are hired to rescue an extremely valuable, kidnapped Chinese billionaire. It’s all business, until all hell breaks loose and the explosive mix of testosterone and kerosene detonates in a massive fireball that never lets up as the relentless action concludes where the new movie begins.

The Expendables 2 Videogame is a way for fans to experience all of their favorite explosive moments, as their favorite stars, in Four-Player Co-op action.

Key Features:

  • Over-The-Top Action: Experience intense firepower, huge explosions and relentless opposition as you play out all of your favorite over-the-top action moments from The Expendables movies.
  • Four-Player Co-op: Team up with three of your friends for Expendables co-op action. Take on the single-player campaign or compete in the many challenge modes and work together to join the elite ranks.
  • Expendables Characters: Play as some of the most memorable characters from The Expendables movies: Barney Ross, Yin Yang, Gunnar Jensen and Hale Caesar.
  • Challenge Modes: Challenge yourself, your buddies or the rest of the worldwide leaderboards in the many Expendables challenge modes that unlock as you play through the intense campaign.
  • Vehicular Combat: Take it to the enemy as you fly choppers & airplanes, drive 4x4’s & motorbikes and wreak havoc with your entire vehicular arsenal.
  • Signature Cinematic Kills: Experience some of the most gratifying finishes ever with a close-up dynamic camera capturing your entire array of stylish signature moves for each Expendables character.
  • Battle in Foreign Terrain: Battle in tactical, assault, stealth and melee missions from the Balkan countryside with forests to mountainous Somalian deserts, Kowloon industrial docks, Burmese Jungles and much more.

data.short_description: Experience all of the explosive moments, as your favorite stars, in Four-Player Co-op action!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Italian, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows® XP SP3 / Windows Vista® SP2
  • Processor:Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia Geforce 8xxx series or ATI Radeon HD 4xxx series
  • Hard Drive:4 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0–compliant sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows® 7 SP1
  • Processor:Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia Geforce 2xx series or Radeon HD 5xxx series
  • Hard Drive:4 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0–compliant sound card
